_config:Query._config:SQL: SELECT childgroup.IDENTIFIER GroupIdentifier, CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD , parentgroup.IDENTIFIER ParentGroupIdentifier, CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT , CATGRPREL.SEQUENCE, PARENTGROUPDESC.NAME parentgroupname, CHILDGROUPDESC.NAME childgroupname FROM CATGRPREL, CATGROUP childgroup, CATGROUP parentgroup, CATGRPDESC childgroupdesc, CATGRPDESC parentgroupdesc, CATALOG WHERE CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD =childgroup.CATGROUP_ID AND parentgroup.CATGROUP_ID = CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT AND CATALOG.CATALOG_ID = CATGRPREL.CATALOG_ID AND childgroupdesc.CATGROUP_ID = childgroup.catgroup_id AND parentgroupdesc.CATGROUP_ID =parentgroup.CATGROUP_ID AND CHILDGROUPDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 AND PARENTGROUPDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 AND CATALOG.IDENTIFIER = 'MattelCAS' order by parentgroup.IDENTIFIER

SELECT childgroup.IDENTIFIER GroupIdentifier, CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD GroupUniqueId, parentgroup.IDENTIFIER ParentGroupIdentifier, CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT ParentGroupUniqueId, CATGRPREL.SEQUENCE, PARENTGROUPDESC.NAME parentgroupname, CHILDGROUPDESC.NAME childgroupname FROM CATGRPREL, CATGROUP childgroup, CATGROUP parentgroup, CATGRPDESC childgroupdesc, CATGRPDESC parentgroupdesc, CATALOG WHERE CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD =childgroup.CATGROUP_ID AND parentgroup.CATGROUP_ID = CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT AND CATALOG.CATALOG_ID = CATGRPREL.CATALOG_ID AND childgroupdesc.CATGROUP_ID = childgroup.catgroup_id AND parentgroupdesc.CATGROUP_ID =parentgroup.CATGROUP_ID AND CHILDGROUPDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 AND PARENTGROUPDESC.LANGUAGE_ID = -1 AND CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_CHILD =? AND CATGRPREL.CATGROUP_ID_PARENT =?
